body_html: @mikaelfs Thanks. I was able to build using your instructions as a baseline, but with some changes. The gcc 5.5 will introduce an error related to the conversion of void *, and I need to use gcc 6 to build. I also found some issue with opencv, so that I am using -DUSE_OPENCV=0 for cmake.
body_text: @mikaelfs Thanks. I was able to build using your instructions as a baseline, but with some changes. The gcc 5.5 will introduce an error related to the conversion of void *, and I need to use gcc 6 to build. I also found some issue with opencv, so that I am using -DUSE_OPENCV=0 for cmake.
body: @mikaelfs Thanks. I was able to build using your instructions as a baseline, but with some changes. The gcc 5.5 will introduce an error related to the conversion of void *, and I need to use gcc 6 to build. I also found some issue with opencv, so that I am using -DUSE_OPENCV=0 for cmake.
